javadoc: Base interface for all filesystem browser gtree nodes.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the {@link FSRL} of the filesystem object that this node represents.

The root of filesystems will return a {@link FSRLRoot}. @return {@link FSRL} of the filesystem object.
methods.name: getFSRL
methods.comment:
Returns the FSRL of the filesystem object that this node represents.
 
 The root of filesystems will return a FSRLRoot.

methods.name: findContainingFileSystemFSBRootNode
methods.comment:
Returns the FSBRootNode that represents the root of the file system that
 contains the specified file node.

params.name: node
params.comment: GTree node that represents a file.

return.comment: FSBRootNode that represents the file system holding the file.

methods.name: getNodesFromFileList
methods.comment: Helper method to convert GFile objects to FSBNode objects.

params.name: files
params.comment: List of GFile objects to convert

return.comment:
List of FSBNode instances (return typed as a GTreeNode list),
 specific to each GFile instance's type.

methods.name: getNodeFromFile
methods.comment: Helper method to convert a single GFile object into a FSBNode object.

return.comment: a new FSBNode with type specific to the GFile's type.

name: FSBNode
comment: Base interface for all filesystem browser gtree nodes.
